Triplelift.com | Mobile (SDK) Software Engineer | New York, NYC | On Site

TripleLift is looking for a Mobile Software Engineer to spearhead our mobile advertising technology initiative. This individual will lead the technical initiatives that will allow TripleLift to enable and enhance the native applications of our thousands of publishers. This role will focus on prototyping, creating proofs-of-concept, and launching our native ad SDKs and frameworks for Android, IOS, and possibly other platforms.
